com.percussion.cms.objectstore
Class PSSlot

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSCmsComponent
      com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSSlot
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSComponent, Cloneable
public class PSSlot
extends PSCmsComponent

The slot is basically a container for other items with particular formatting (variants). It only allows a specified set of content type/variants to be attached with certain types of relationships. These attached items are known as related content.

This class doesn't override the clone method because the clone provided by the Object base class is satisfactory.

Constructor Detail

PSSlot

public PSSlot(String name,
              int id,
              String description,
              Map allowedVariants)
Creates an instance. Related content can be added after creation using the addRelatedItem method.

Parameters:
name - The name for the associated slot. Never null or empty. Names are treated in a case-insensitive manner.
id - The unique numeric identifier for the slot.
description - An optional message that describes what the slot is used for. May be null or empty.
allowedVariants - For each entry, the key is an Integer wrapping the content type id while the value is an array of int. Each int is the variant id allowed for that associated content type.

PSSlot

public PSSlot(Element source)
       throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Creates an instance from a previously serialized (using toXml ) one.

Parameters:
source - A valid element that meets the dtd defined in the description of toXml(Document). Never null.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - If the supplied source element does not conform to the dtd defined in the fromXml method.
Method Detail

addRelatedItem

public void addRelatedItem(PSLocator item)
Convenience method. Equivalent to calling addRelatedItem(item, Integer.MAX_VALUE).

addRelatedItem

public void addRelatedItem(PSLocator item,
                           int pos)
Inserts the supplied item at the specified position within the list of related items.

Parameters:
item - A reference to an existing item. At this time, no validation is performed that this is an existing item or that it is an allowed type. This will be done when the item is saved.
pos - The order within the existing set to add this item. If pos is less than 0, 0 is used and if it is greater than the length of the list, the item is appended.

getNodeName

public static String getNodeName()
This is the name of the root element in the serialized version of this object.

Returns:
The root name, never null or empty.

getSlotId

public int getSlotId()
A numeric value that uniquely identifies this slot.

Returns:
The id that was passed into the ctor or found in the serialized instance, if created from an Element.

getSlotName

public String getSlotName()
The name is a unique, case-insensitive identifier for a slot.

Returns:
The name supplied in the ctor.

getDescription

public String getDescription()
A short message that describes what this slot is for.

Returns:
The description passed in the ctor, or empty if null was passed. Never null.

equals

public boolean equals(Object o)
Overrides the base class to compare each of the member properties. All members except the name and allowed variants are compared for exact matches. The name is compared case insensitive and the allowed variants are compared order insensitive.

Overrides:
equals in class Object
Returns:
true if all members are equal as defined above, otherwise false is returned.

hashCode

public int hashCode()
Must be overridden to fulfill contract of this method as described in Object.

Overrides:
hashCode in class Object
Returns:
A value computed by concatenating all of the properties except the related content and allowed variants into one string, taking the hashCode of that and adding the hashcode of the list and map. The name is lowercased before it is concatenated.

the generated element, never null.

fromXml

public void fromXml(Element sourceNode,
                    com.percussion.design.objectstore.IPSDocument parentDoc,
                    ArrayList parentComponents)
             throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Replaces the data in this instance with that in a previously serialized version. If any data is invalid, an exception is thrown.

Parameters:
sourceNode - An xml fragment conforming to the dtd described in toXml. Never null.
parentDoc - Unused.
parentComponents - Unused.
Throws:
PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if the XML element node does not represent a type supported by the class.
